attributes.action: Withdrawel from the UN migration pact.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK should follow the likes of Austria, Poland, USA and Hungary by  not agreeing and withdrawing from the UN migration pact.


The Intergovernmental Conference to Adopt the Global Compact for Safe, Orderly and Regular Migration  takes place in Marrakech on the 10th and 11th of December, 2018, and is hosted by the Kingdom of Morocco.

The UK should NOT agree and WITHDRAW from the UN migration pact.
attributes.background: The UK should follow the likes of Austria, Poland, USA and Hungary by not agreeing and withdrawing from the UN migration pact.
